class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 29 - July 2, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: PORT 334W examines Portugal's history, via an analysis of its capital's cultural productions. The course aims to evaluate how major cultural and historic events played a role in the development of the country, as well as to investigate the interconnections between multiple artistic productions.
prerequisites: PORT 201 or equivalent transfer credit  as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1367, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Teixeira, Status: Open
